description:
Lene "Clavier" Rosamunde was a member of XAT`s Paladin squad - Team 3. She transferred to XAT from the same police unit as Brad and Al, to pursue Brad for which she had feelings. She was the one, who gave Brad his lucky charm bullet, and received same one from him.
While being tortured by Wolf, who tried to convince her and Brad to join him as Amalgams, she asked Brad to return her his lucky charm. Which he did, shooting her to death, and relieving from pain.
name: Lene Rosamunde
